com.example.currencyrates

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.currencyrates.FileUtils

  • final class FileUtils
extends Object
    File Utilities class that helps saving image files.

    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nikola Georgiev

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static File createTempFile(android.content.Context context, String fileName)
      Creates temporary file in the cache directory "country_images", in case file cannot be created it will return Null Pointer.

      Use this method to save image file, in case the internal device storage is writable.

    • Method Detail

      • saveTempBitmap

        static android.net.Uri saveTempBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                      android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                      String fileName)
        Use this method to save a temporary image file, in case the internal device storage is writable.
        Parameters:
        context - Context - The base application context.
        bitmap - Bitmap - An instance of the image bitmap that will be saved.
        fileName - String - The name of the file that will be saved.
        Returns:
        Uri - The Uri path of the saved file. NULL - in case either some of the context, bitmap, and fileName have Null Pointer.

      • saveImage

        private static android.net.Uri saveImage(android.content.Context context,
                                         android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                         String fileName)
        Use this method to save image file, in case the internal device storage is writable.
        Parameters:
        context - Context - The base application context.
        bitmap - Bitmap - An instance of the image bitmap that will be saved.
        fileName - String - The name of the file that will be saved.
        Returns:
        Uri - The Uri path of the saved file. NULL - in case either some of the context, bitmap, and fileName have Null Pointer.

      • getIconUri

        static android.net.Uri getIconUri(android.content.Context context,
                                  String fileName)
        Gets icon Uri based on the file name of it's image.
        Parameters:
        context - Context - The base application context.
        fileName - String - The name of the file that is saved.
        Returns:
        Uri - The Uri path of the saved file. NULL - in case either some of the context, and fileName have Null Pointer, or the file cannot be created.

      • createTempFile

        static File createTempFile(android.content.Context context,
                           String fileName)
        Creates temporary file in the cache directory "country_images", in case file cannot be created it will return Null Pointer.
        Parameters:
        context - Context - The base application context.
        fileName - String - The name of the file that is saved.
        Returns:
        Uri - The Uri path of the saved file. NULL - in case either some of the context, and fileName have Null Pointer, or the file cannot be created.

      • isFileExisting

        static boolean isFileExisting(android.content.Context context,
                              String fileName)
        Checks whether a given file with name exists in the cache directory.
        Parameters:
        context - Context - The base application context.
        fileName - String - The name of the file that is saved.
        Returns:
        boolean - True - in case the file exists, False - in case the file does not exist.

      • isInternalStorageWritable

        static boolean isInternalStorageWritable(android.content.Context context)
        Checks if internal storage is available for read and write
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        boolean - True - in case the internal storage of the device is writable, False - in case has no permissions to write in the device internal storage.
